revised_title: The de Haas-van Alphen Effect in Aluminum: Experimental Results and Analysis
tldr: This article presents an experimental study of the de Haas-van Alphen effect in aluminum. The authors measure the torque on a crystal of aluminum in a uniform magnetic field and analyze the resulting oscillations to determine the periods of the high-frequency oscillations. The study provides insights into the magnetic properties and behavior of aluminum and contributes to the understanding of the de Haas-van Alphen effect in metals.
